item.title: Sprint 7 Review
item.description: Sprint 7 Review - Gaining Momentum This Sprint In A Nutshell

item.title: Sprint 6 Review
item.description: Sprint 6 Review - Explosion Update! 3-Shot Explosion Throughout our many versions of Pathos, there was one thing that everyone continued to enjoy in our game. Explosions. In the previous few builds, we didn’t have any boom-booms and it just seemed to leave a void in our hearts. Not any longer! In this sprint we added a much anticipated feature that we have had planned for a while now.
